id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.delete: delete from client_group_table where cid = #{cid} and gid = #{gid}
mapper.select: select cid from client_group_table where gid = #{gid}
mapper.update: update client_group_table set gid = 1 where cid = #{cid} and gid = #{oldgid} and (select count(*) from client_group_table where cid = #{cid} and gid = 1) = 0
update client_msg set userid = #{newid} where userid = #{oldid}
